DOC.brief_summary: To investigate dose-response Rapid Acting Intramuscular Olanzapine Agitated Patients Schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: A Study Using Rapid Acting Intramuscular Olanzapine Agitated Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Patients must schizophrenia meet disease diagnostic criterion DSMIVTR Patients must inpatient study Patients must minimum total score le 14 five item PANSSEC least one individual item score less 4 use 17 scoring system prior first injection study drug Patients know history diabetes mellitus . Patients receive treatment antipsychotic prohibit concomitant medicine within 2 hour prior first IM study drug administration Patients treatment benzodiazepine within 4 hour prior first IM study drug administration .
